description: The CRM ELITE is the project to monitor the performance of the ELITE service in the market and come up for new marketing strategies. CRM ELITE is the project with OBIEE as front end dashboard and SAP BODI as the back end ETL tool .

Cspire wireless is the leading mobile network provider in Mississippi State. The organization has a reputation for its personalized wireless services.  The Current project with Infosys is a migration project based on Netezza Database.  Cspire has been using Oracle for a very long time and now they are switching to Netezza as their Data Ware house.  The choice of switching to Netezza is because of the analytics power of Netezza and faster daily load processing.

Invista Financial Group provides diversified financial services to emerging, growth and established technology companies and the life science, venture capital and premium wine markets As a Business Objects Data Integrator developer, I was responsible for extracting data from different heterogeneous data sources into a target database.

BCBS well known insurance company comes with customer claim project. A front end application has been developed to monitor customer claims.   The project has been handled with CTS, an information technology company that specializes in the identification and resolution of business intelligence (BI) challenges with BCBS. Its corporate office is located in McAllen, Texas.
The project involved development of reports using Business Objects and WEBI to cater Ad-hoc reporting needs.

IDBI Mutual's principal activities are to provide financial services to consumers and small businesses such as retail banking, mortgage lending, consumer lending, business banking, business lending, insurance services, credit card services, commercial real estate mortgage and consumer investment services.

The SG Finance Group is a non-profit, public enterprise fund that operates like a mutual insurance procurement applications carrier. State Fund employees located in office locations throughout AP State provide full services for employers and their injured employees. Data warehouse for insurance claims system for generating reports based on the category of employers, vendors, and employees.
